name: Litl Lotl
description:
Explore

Solve puzzles

And maybe commit some genocide!

Play as an adorable axolotl and play through 3 levels filled with vibrant art, puzzles and more! 

Play through the game using your unique skillset of detaching your body parts and flinging them wherever you desire,  be careful though, doing so has a cost. 

The team: 

Tay - Leader Programmer 

Dan - Programmer

 Madi - Artist

 Rey - Artist

 Jade - Artist 

Jake - Sound Designer, Programmer
